block.l: function encodeUnsignedInteger(value, size) { var pdata = []; i=0; mask=2**size-1; do { pdata[i] = value & mask; i++; value >>= i * size; } while (value != 0); return pdata; } var pdata = encodeUnsignedInteger(value, 7); pdata[0] = value & 0x7f; pdata[1] = (value >> 7) & 0x7f; pdata[2] = (value >> 14) & 0x7f; this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer([0xF0, 0x08, 0x01, pdata[0], pdata[1], pdata[2],0xF7]));

function encodeUnsignedInteger(value, size) { var pdata = []; i=0; mask=2**size-1; do { pdata[i] = value & mask; i++; value >>= i * size; } while (value != 0); return pdata; } var pdata = encodeUnsignedInteger(value, 7); pdata[0] = value & 0x7f; pdata[1] = (value >> 7) & 0x7f; pdata[2] = (value >> 14) & 0x7f; this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer([0xF0, 0x08, 0x02, pdata[0], pdata[1], pdata[2],0xF7]));

function encodeUnsignedInteger(value, size) { var pdata = []; i=0; mask=2**size-1; do { pdata[i] = value & mask; i++; value >>= i * size; } while (value != 0); return pdata; } var pdata = encodeUnsignedInteger(value, 7); pdata[0] = value & 0x7f; pdata[1] = (value >> 7) & 0x7f; pdata[2] = (value >> 14) & 0x7f; pdata[0] = value & 0x7f; pdata[1] = (value >> 7) & 0x7f; this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer([0xF0, 0x08, 0x03, pdata[0], pdata[1],0xF7]));

function encodeUnsignedInteger(value, size) { var pdata = []; i=0; mask=2**size-1; do { pdata[i] = value & mask; i++; value >>= i * size; } while (value != 0); return pdata; } var pdata = encodeUnsignedInteger(value, 7); pdata[0] = value & 0x7f; pdata[1] = (value >> 7) & 0x7f; pdata[2] = (value >> 14) & 0x7f; pdata[0] = value & 0x7f; pdata[1] = (value >> 7) & 0x7f; this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer([0xF0, 0x08, 0x04, pdata[0], pdata[1],0xF7]));
